title: Giannantonio Selva. Biografia e opere.
description: Whole of texts and historical testymonies by and on Giannantonio Selva, venician architect, professor at Accademia di Belle Arti, artist author of the Gran Teatro La Fenice in Venice. The book collects also texts by Selva on Michele Sammicheli and of Antonio Canova, Antonio Diedo, Ippolito Pindemonte and others on the works of Selva himself and on his life.Emiliano Balistreri describes all the venetian plans and projects by Selva and sketchs his biography and his partnership and relationship from the second half of XVIII century to the year 1819.
author: Emiliano Balistreri
